page.title: 19HOW MUM SPENDS HER DAY
page.content: At 6.45am on a weekday the alarm rings.I get up,put on my dressinggown and go down stairs.Then I switch on the kettle,for a cup of tea,and make some toast.I watch T.V for the news and weather. I get washed and dressed then tidy the bedrooms.I put the washing in the machine and do the dishes. 8.30am the children and I get into my car and I drop them off at school 3 miles away,then carry on to nursery for under fives where I work till lunchtime.On the way home I do some shopping.When I get home I hang out the washing and have lunch.Then I tidy the house and make dinner. Once I have cleared up I listen to the children read.I'll then do the ironing while I watch T.V.Then off to bed again at 11.00pm.
